import StaticXAxisTicksGraph from '../../../example/Graphs-Carbon/General/Axes/StaticXAxisTicks?dev-site-example';

require('details-polyfill');

# Axis Ticks

Axis ticks contains simple graph examples with static x-axis ticks, formatted ticks and suppress tick values trailing zeros.

## Getting Started

- Install with [npmjs](https://www.npmjs.com):
  - `npm i @cerner/carbon-graphs --save-dev`

## Usage
```js
import Carbon from '@cerner/carbon-graphs/dist/js/carbon-graphs.js';
import '@cerner/carbon-graphs/dist/css/carbon-graphs.css';
```

## Examples
